title: Tucker Carlson breaks silence on being fired from Fox News: "The only thing that bothers me... "
description:
For the first time, Tucker Carlson addressed his firing from Fox News. Carlson sat down for an EXCLUSIVE interview on Rumble with host Russell Brand.

The political world was shocked when news broke in April that the news network fired its #1 star out of the blue. No one was more surprised by it than Tucker Carlson.

— (@)
I didn't expect to get fired that morning at all. So I was shocked.... but wasn't really shocked. I wasn't mad. I don't know why I was fired. I really don't. I'm not angry about it. You can believe me or not, but I think you can feel that I'm not. I wish Fox well.

Everyone has their theories. His biographer says it was a combination of a planned January 6th monologue and the Dominion lawsuit. Alex Jones said on our show that the Vanity Fair story was closest to the truth. That was where (and I'm oversimplifying) Tucker was having dinner with Rupert Murdoch and his fiance. Tucker talked about how much he loved God. Rupert's fiance agreed that she loved both God AND Tucker. Atheist Rupert Murdoch who is freaked out by religious talk... freaked out. He dumped his fiance, and Carlson suddenly no longer has a home at Fox News.

Tucker, to no one's surprise, didn't confirm any of it. Not when there is a tens of millions of dollar buy-out on the table. He seemed at peace with everything. There was only one thing that bothered him:

The only thing that bothers me is that I'm 54, and when you get a little bit older you could lose your drive. My only concern is that I've been a little too happy [and not engaged]. Live has got to be much more than that."

Rumors are Carlson is at work behind the scenes to launch a new media venture.


>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Watch: UPS driver celebrates first American paycheck with a powerful message against communism
description:
Not everything in this world is terrible. It only seems that way when you spend too much time on the internet. Though, the internet is also where you find videos like this. A UPS driver who escaped socialist rule in Cuba celebrating his paycheck in America. I'll trade one of him for ten Zoomers who tell you "real Marxism has never been tried" any day.

Not sure who he is or where this is from. I also don't know how it suddenly got all dusty in my office.

This man’s joy after receiving his first paycheck in America 🥲 pic.twitter.com/zSuSyrG0DM
— Good News Dog (@goodnewsdog) November 15, 2022

"But Brodigan, wait until he discovers taxes!"

Lol... you said "butt Brodigan." Yes, we've all had the same experience when we first discover how much the government takes of our hard-earned money. And the same experience when we find out where the money is going. Our friend here has a different background and offers a different perspective.

I prefer that to Fidel Castro, Castro took everything. Communism took everything.

The UPS driver's next words may even make Mike Rowe misty.

You know what? This is my first hourly paycheck. That I feel every hour of work counts. That every hour is important in my life. And you can work hard for something. That's an emotion I cannot describe.

See?

God bless you, friend.

>

<

title: Goose goes beastmode on woman walking from her car as onlookers laugh their butt off: "Lord Jesus, fix it"
description:
A Friday palate cleanser to send you into your Friday. Everyone can use a break from reading about the clowns who run this country and our world into the ground. There is only so much "everything sucks," "everything is terrible" and "oh my God, someone do something" that a person can take. As a means of decompressing, we invite you to enjoy this video of a woman being chased by goose in a parking lot. The goose had her reasons.

All while onlookers have their smartphones recording. Make sure the volume is up.

@organizedesigncreate I was on the second floor of the building. Nobody warned us about the baby daddy duck! #floridaducks ♬ original sound - Victoria

RUN! THE GOOSE GONNA KILL YOU!

The backstory is what truly makes this an all-time video, compliments of our friends at Not The Bee. The video was recorded by a woman named Victoria Willard. Victoria is at work one day when her boss came in and said he was almost attacked by a goose.

As it turns out, another goose had laid eggs and, for reasons known to only the goose, made her nest in a parking lot near cars and predators. Victoria did the only thing she could do. She sat at the window with her smartphone out waiting to record the goose guard attacking someone else. Why? Because it's hilarious to see someone get attacked by a bird.

You come for the bird attack. You stay for the woman running in terror while Victoria's coworker laughs his ass off. It's 10/10 content.

Victoria followed up to say the eggs hatched, and both mother and babies are doing fine. Also, it's safe to go back to work.

>

<

title: "Michael Scott in female form:" Kamala Harris gets roasted for tossing the word salad in failed attempt to define "culture"
description:
If Vice President Kamala Harris is known for one thing, it's that she likes to toss the salad. Toss the WORD salad, mind you. But if you talk to former San Francisco mayor Willie Brown, he might have some stories.

Harris latest derptastic public appearance was at the 2023 Essence Festival of Culture at the Caesars Superdome Friday. I guess the White House felt she would be "for the culture" more than Hunter Biden or Poot Buttgig.

The problem is when she was asked to define what "culture" meant to her.

— (@)

Dude. Really?

It is remarkable how someone can be a heartbeat away from the presidency with a team of consultants to make her more likable, and yet THIS is the best they can come up with:

"Culture is a reflection of our moment and our time, right? And present culture is the way we express how we're feeling about the moment and we should always find times to express how we feel about the moment that is a reflection of joy ‘cause you know — it comes in the morning."

Wait... what happens in the morning?

In theory, the unpopular Harris is running for reelection as Joe Biden's running mate. It's hard to believe. The only time you hear from her is when she tosses the salad, or when Texas drops off a busload of more undocumented illegals on her doorstep. It's hard enough to believe Biden is running for reelection. But as Biden's 2024 opponent Ron DeSantis says, there may be a reason why they keep Kamala around.

— (@)

Harris's appearance at EssenceFest was on the same day the White House announced they found a bag of cocaine by where the vice president parks her car. No one is implicating Kamala Harris. They were just oddly specific that, out of all the ways they can describe where they found the cocaine, they chose "where, for example, the vice president's vehicle is parked." I'm not saying the two are released. It would be reckless for me or any other right-wing blogger to speculate,

>

<

title: Toby Keith returns from battling cancer, sends fiery message to never apologize for being patriotic: "F*** em"
description:
I lost my mom after an eight-year battle with cancer this year. Between that, her first bout with it, and losing my dad to it as well, I know firsthand how it ravages not only your body but your spirit. For that alone, seeing Toby Keith return to the stage after battling stomach cancer with a two-and-a-half-hour set is both an amazing and emotional site to see.

The fact that he still has that redneck in him (kinda like having that dawg in you, but for country singers) is what makes you yell "hell yeah, brother."

@countrymusicamerica

“Dont apologize for being patriotic, fuck em” - TK #fyp #foryou #foryoupage #music #country #countrymusic #usa #independenceday #4thofjuly #america #tobykeith #rap #hiphop #now #dance

As he wrapped up his pro-America anthem "Courtesy of the Red, White, and Blue," he made sure his audience knew to never apologize for being patriotic. And to the haters, he had two words and one finger for them "f*ck 'em."

While one of his more popular songs, if we're all being honest with ourselves, everyone knows what Toby's best song is:

— (@)

Keith first announced he had been diagnosed with stomach cancer in June 2022. He gave the Oklahoman a report of where how he was doing a year later:

I’ve got more wind. And I’m thinking about bringing the band in and setting up, playing two or three days somewhere just to see if I can get through two hours. All I gotta do is see if I can get through two or three nights of work and get a little break in this chemo, and we’ll go back to work.

The plan was to do a rehearsal with his band to see where he was at physically. The dress rehearsal turned into back-to-back shows at his Oklahoma bar Hollywood Corners. Two nights and five hours of live music later, I think it's safe to say Toby is ready.

Continued prayers to the Big Dog Daddy. We could use him back out on the road sooner rather than later.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Watch: Dad claims school board is too "chicken" to remove porn from schools, so he throws chicken feed at them
description:
Parents across the country are still speaking out on behalf of their children at school board meetings. Why? Because the Joe Biden Democrat Party is still adamant about indoctrinating students with glorified porn. School boards are either unwilling or too chicken sh*t to act. One South Carolina father gave his board the benefit of the doubt and claimed it was the latter.

So he threw chicken feed at them.

— (@)
There’s your chicken feed. I give you this gift as a way to demonstrate mine and many others’ opinion of your lack of action. Chicken. Too afraid. Matter of fact, your behavior gives chicken a bad name.

The father, David Cook, explained the symbolism in the full version of this clip. His mother-in-law lives in Chile. When there was no food and there were hard times, the people of Chile would get upset that military leaders didn’t take action. So citizens threw chicken feed at them since those leaders were too "chicken" to take action.

Mr. Cook also made the point that there’s a big difference between a "book ban" and eliminating access to this material while children are in school. A fact that leftists have deployed "independent" "fact" checkers to dispute.

It's unclear what specific pornographic books Cook is disputing. If I were to guess, it's from the usual collection of books about kids about tasting their vagina slime, how to give a handy to make someone cum, or graphic novels explicitly showing two dudes f*cking. Material that in the olden days would only be suitable for Penthouse magazine. In 2023, these books get awards because they are written by LGBTQ authors. To progressives, that's the difference between "porn" and "equity."

>

<

title: Justin Trudeau gets roasted for his Taylor Swift fangirling that is even pathetic by his standards
description:
On any normal week. Stanford University announced they were teaching a class on Taylor Swift lyrics -- the prestigious Stanford University -- would be the silliest T. Swift content we came across. Then Justin "I Feel Pretty" Trudeau came along fangirling on Twitter.

The pop star is embarked on a massive world tour. And in all sincerity, shout out Taylor Swift for it. She's gonna gross a billion dollars this year doing marathon 4+ hours concerts. She's this generation's Springsteen (I mean that in a good way). Canada's walking pile of soy and hair goop wants a taste of the revenue. I'd normally chalk this up to a social media intern. But you know he wrote this himself ad he anxiously waited for his copy of Speak Now (Taylor's Version).

— (@)

Look, I try to stay in a state of grace about things and I know we have bad blood with I.F.P. Trudeau. Frequent visitors to the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website know all too well that Trudeau is not the man. But dude, you need to calm down. And look what you made me do! I had to resort to Taylor Swift puns to make my point.

This is literally Justin Trudeau right now:

\u201cStanford University is offering a class on Taylor Swift lyrics, and I hope all of these incoming freshmen know Joe Biden can't bail out their student loans anymore...\u201d
— Louder with Crowder Dot Com (@Louder with Crowder Dot Com) 1688658375

Trudeau could not look any more pathetic if he started using "band-aids don't fix bullet holes" as his slogan to strip Canadians of their right to self-defense. A point his fellow countrymen were quick to hammer him on.

— (@)


— (@)


— (@)

Unless this is all the beginning of an evil plan by Trudeau, who is also a fangirl of the World Economic Forum (WEF). Ticket prices are so silly for Taylor that you almost have to mortgage your house. Taylor comes to Canada. Trudeau has the Canadian government buy the homes so people can afford tickets. Then he can control citizens by turning them into a permanent renters class since the agenda for the WEF is for you to own nothing and like it.

Either that, or I.F.P. Trudeau has his "Eras Tour" outfit planned and he needs an excuse to wear it.

>

<
